originalText.text: I’ve been a client of Scott J. Aveda for more than 15 years. (I started further back even further uptown across the street from Columbia.) How much do I count on them, well, I’ve been coming from Brooklyn every 6 to 7 weeks to work with Alyssa since 2011. Even in times when money was tight, that extra time and a little extra expense was always worth it. Staff is top-notch as a rule. Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
Michael oh Michael! Mr.Magic Hands touched by an angel!!! I was anxiously trying to get my hair colored & cut for a special formal occasion and was in desperate need of skilled hands to fix my terrible color (& damage!!)
Michael is so gifted in the hair world that he easily gets booked up the wazoo! He only had availability in his busy schedule to address my color, but when he saw our baseline and our end goal he was able to fit me into his schedule and do everything I wanted in 1 sitting. I felt like a VIP even though I was a brand new client!!
Michael is so warm and inviting, he made me feel so comfortable as I divulged about my life in the hours I spent in his chair, thank you Michael for creating such a safe and comfortable environment!!
I am BEYOND grateful for how stunning my hair color came out- the colors create such beautiful definition yet blend together so effortlessly. Even though I was in dire need of a haircut to rid my hair of all the damage, Michael was still able to maintain my original length and even get my natural healthy curls back, like I said MR.MAGIC HANDS!!

originalText.text:
Review is specifically for the stylist Romeo. I had a 10:15 appointment and ended up going to the wrong location. I texted them at 10:15 I am in a cab over to the west side location. They said they had a 15 min grace period and I showed up EXACTLY at 10:30. It took them 1-2 min to check me in because there was a line of people ahead of me.

Then Romeo proceeds to tell me we have rules I can’t see you and walks away with a total lack of regard or customer service.  I told him I was here within the grace period, it’s not my fault there was a line to check in.

Another hairstyles saw what happened and offered to see me, thank you Raphael for your kindness!

originalText.text: I’ve been getting by hair cut by Kenya for the past couple years at both the Morningside and Upper West Side salons. She has been the most attentive and talented stylist I’ve ever worked with. Not only does she consistently give me great haircuts but she is aware of my hair health and gives me personalized advice or treatments. She also focuses on my future hair goals. I know I am in good hands when Kenya is cutting my hair and I would recommend her to anyone and everyone!

text.text: I’ve been getting by hair cut by Kenya for the past couple years at both the Morningside and Upper West Side salons. originalText.text: First time here and I was pleasantly surprised. Kenya gave me a great haircut and she challenged me to try something new and I love it! Romeo got rid of my gray roots and color matched my hair perfect. All the staff were friendly and the price was very reasonable. I’m new to the city and I think I found my salon.
